scripts.build: pnpm clean && ncc build src/index.ts -o dist && babel dist --out-dir dist && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const items=['images','plugin.json','bin'];for(const item of items){const from=path.join(__dirname,item);if(!fs.existsSync(from))continue;const to=path.join(__dirname,'dist',item);const stat=fs.statSync(from);fs.cpSync(from,to,{recursive:stat.isDirectory()});}const macBin=path.join(__dirname,'dist','bin','color_picker_macos');try{if(fs.existsSync(macBin))fs.chmodSync(macBin,0o755);}catch(e){}"
scripts.package: pnpm build && cd dist && zip -r ../wox.plugin.colorpicker.wox *.js *.json images bin && cd ..
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --watch images --watch plugin.json --ext json,ts,js,mjs,png --exec pnpm run build
scripts.clean: node -e "var { rmdirSync, existsSync } = require('fs'), path = require('path'); ['./dist'].forEach(fPath => {if (existsSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath))) rmdirSync(path.join(__dirname, fPath), { recursive: true })}); process.exit(0);"
